title: Topic 02 Question 33
body: You have an Azure web app named webapp1 that uses the .NET Core runtime stack. You have an Azure Application Insights resource named AppInsights1 that collects telemetry data generated by webapp1.
You plan to deploy webapp1 by using an Azure DevOps pipeline.
You need to modify the sampling rate of the telemetry data processed by AppInsights1 without having to redeploy webapp1 after each modification.
What should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
